lal21:2: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaiścema evaṁrūpā vyūhā bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe bodhimaṇḍe ’bhisaṁkṛtā abhūvan | svayaṁ ca bodhisattvo yāvanto daśasu dikṣvatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṁ buddhānāṁ bhagavatāṁ sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu bodhimaṇḍālaṁkāravyūhāstān sarvāṁstasmin bodhimaṇḍe saṁdarśayati sma ||
lal21:3: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat—iha khalu kāmadhātau māraḥ pāpīyānadhipatirīśvaro vaśavartī | naitanmama pratirūpaṁ bhavedyadahaṁ tenāvidito ’nuttarāṁ samyaksaṁbodhimabhisaṁbudhyeyam | yannvahaṁ mārasya pāpīyasaḥ saṁcodanaṁ kuryām | tasmin vijite sarve kāmāvacarā devādayo nigṛhītā bhaviṣyanti | tataśca māraparṣadaḥ pūrvāvaropitakuśalamūlā mārakāyikā devaputrāste mama siṁhavikrīḍitaṁ dṛṣṭvā anuttarāyāṁ samyaksaṁbodhau cittamutpādayiṣyanti ||
lal21:4: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattva evamanuvicintya tasyāṁ velāyāṁ bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośāt sarvamāramaṇḍalavidhvaṁsanakarīṁ nāmaikāṁ raśmimudasṛjat | yayā raśmyā sarvasmiṁstrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sarvamārabhavanānyavabhāsya jihmīkṛtāni saṁprakampitāni cābhūvan | sarvaścāyaṁ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhāturmahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo ’bhūt | tasyāśca prabhāyā māraḥ pāpīyānidamevaṁ rūpaṁ śabdamaśrauṣīt—
lal21:5: kalpaughacīrṇacarito hyabhiśuddhasattvaḥ śuddhodanasya tanayaḥ pravijahya rājyam |
lal21:6: so nirgato hitakaro hyamṛtābhilāṣī bodhidrumaṁ hyupagato ’dya kuru prayatnam ||
lal21:7: so tīrṇa ātmana parānapi tārayeyā moceṣyate sa ca parāṁ svayameva muktaḥ |
lal21:8: āśvāsaprāpta sa parānapi cāśvaseyā nirvāpayiṣyati parāṁ parinirvṛtaśca ||
lal21:9: śūnyāṁ kariṣyati āpāyatrayo ’pyaśeṣāṁ pūrṇāṁ kariṣyati purāṁ suramānuṣāṇām |
lal21:10: dhyānānabhijña paramaṁ amṛtaṁ sukhaṁ ca dāsyatyasau hitakaro amṛtaṁ spṛśitvā ||
lal21:11: śūnyaṁ kariṣyati puraṁ tava kṛṣṇabandho abalo balo balavihīnu apakṣyapakṣyo |
lal21:12: na jñāsyase kva nu vrajāmi karomi kiṁ vā yada dharmavarṣamabhivarṣi svayaṁ svayaṁbhūḥ ||
lal21:14: iti hi bhikṣavo māraḥ pāpīyānābhiḥ saṁcodanābhirgāthābhiḥ saṁcoditaḥ san dvātriṁśadākāraṁ svapnamapaśyat | katamad dvātriṁśadākāram? tadyathā—tamasākulaṁ ca svabhavanamapaśyat | rajasākulaṁ cākīrṇaśarkarakaṭhalyaṁ ca svabhavanamapaśyat | bhītatrastodvignaṁ diśo daśa prapalāyamānaṁ cātmānamapaśyat | vibhraṣṭamakuṭamapaviddhakuṇḍalaṁ cātmānamapaśyat | śuṣkoṣṭhagalatālukaṁ cātmānamapaśyat | saṁtaptahṛdayaṁ cātmānamapaśyat | śīrṇapatrapuṣpaphalāni codyānānyapaśyat | apagatajalāḥ pariśuṣkāśca puṣkariṇīrapaśyat | haṁsakroñcamayūrakalaviṅkakuṇālajīvaṁjīvakādīṁśca pakṣigaṇātrchīrṇapakṣānapaśyat | bherīśaṅkhamṛdaṅgapaṭahatuṇavavīṇāvallakītāḍasampādīṁśca vādyabhāṇḍāṁśchinnavichinnān bhūmau nipatitānapaśyat | priyajanaparivārāśca māramutsṛjya dīnamukhā ekānte gatvā pradhyāyantamapaśyat | agramahiṣīṁ ca māriṇīṁ śayanabhraṣṭāṁ dharaṇyāmubhābhyāṁ pāṇibhyāṁ śīrṣamabhipīḍayantīmapaśyat | ye ca te māraputrā vīryavattamāśca balavattamāśca tejavattamāśca prajñāvattamāśca taṁ bodhisattvaṁ bodhimaṇḍavarāgragataṁ namasyanta evamapaśyat | ātmanīyāśca duhitrīrhā tāta hā tāteti krandantyo ’paśyat | malinacailagātraṁ cātmānamapaśyat | avakīrṇapāṁśuśiraskaṁ ca pāṇḍudurvarṇamojopahṛtaṁ cātmānamapaśyat | harmyakūṭāgāragavākṣatoraṇāṁśca rajasāvakīrṇān patato ’paśyat | ye cāsya te senāpatayo yakṣarākṣasakumbhāṇḍagandharvādhipatayaḥ, tān sarvān hastāñśirasi kṛtvā rodantaḥ krandantaḥ palāyamānāṁścāpaśyat | ye ca te kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu devādhipatayaḥ, tadyathā—dhṛtarāṣṭravirūḍhakavirūpākṣavaiśravaṇaśakrasuyāmasaṁtuṣitasunirmitavaśavartiprabhṛtayaḥ, tān sarvāñśuśruṣamāṇān māraḥ pāpīyān sabodhisattvābhimukhānapaśyat | raṇamadhye cāsyāsirvikośo na bhavati sma | vikrośantamaśivaṁ cātmānamapaśyat | svena ca parivāreṇātmānaṁ parityaktamapaśyat | maṅgalapūrṇakumbhāṁśca patitān dvāre ’paśyat | nāradaṁ ca brāhmaṇamamaṅgalyaśabdaṁ śrāvayantamapaśyat | ānanditaṁ ca dauvārikamanānandaśabdaṁ śrāvayantamapaśyat | tamasākulaṁ ca gaganatalamapaśyat | kāmabhavananivāsinīṁ ca śriyaṁ rudantīmapaśyat | svamaiśvaryaṁ cānaiśvaryamapaśyat | svapakṣaṁ cāpakṣamapaśyat | maṇimuktājālāni ca tūṣṇībhūtāni chinnabhinnapatitānyapaśyat | sarvaṁ ca mārabhavanaṁ pracalitamapaśyat | vṛkṣāñchidyamānānniryūhāṁśca patato ’drākṣīt | sarvaṁ ca mārasenāvyūhamabhimukhaṁ pātyamānamapaśyat ||
lal21:15: iti hi bhikṣava evaṁ dvātriṁśadākāraṁ māraḥ pāpīyān svapnamapaśyat | sa pratibuddhaḥ san bhītastrastaḥ saṁvignaḥ sarvamantarjanaṁ saṁnipātya sabalapārṣadyasenāpatidauvārikasaṁnipatitāṁśca tān viditvā ābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣat—
lal21:16: dṛṣṭvāna tāṁ sa supināṁ namucī dukhārto āmantrayāti suta ye ’pi ca pāriṣadyā |
lal21:17: senāpatiṁ namuci siṁhahanuśca nāmnā sarveṣa teṣa paripṛcchati kṛṣṇabandhuḥ ||
lal21:19: ṣaḍvarṣa duṣkaravratāni caritva ghorā bodhidrumaṁ hyupagataḥ prakuruṣva yatnam ||
lal21:20: so cedvibuddha svayameva hi bodhisattvo bahusattvakoṭinayutāni vibodhayeta |
lal21:21: śūnyaṁ kariṣyati sa me bhavanaṁ hyaśeṣaṁ yada lapsyate hyamṛtu sparśanaśītibhāvam ||
lal21:22: hanta vrajāma sahitā mahatā balena ghātema taṁ śramaṇu eku drumendramūle |
lal21:23: udyojayadhva caturaṅgiṇi śīghra senāṁ yadi icchathā mama priyaṁ ma ciraṁ karotha ||
lal21:24: pratyekabuddhabhi ca arhabhiḥ pūrṇa loko nirvāyamāṇu na balaṁ mama durbalaṁ syāt |
lal21:25: so bhūyu eku jinu bheṣyati dharmarājo gaṇanātivṛttu jinavaṁśu na jātu chidyet ||
lal21:26: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sārthavāho nāma māraputraḥ, sa māraṁ pāpīyāṁsaṁ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣat—
lal21:27: kiṁ tāt bhinnavadano ’si vivarṇavaktro hṛdayaṁ samutplavati vedhati te ’ṅgamaṅgam |
lal21:28: kiṁ te śrutaṁ athava dṛṣṭu bhaṇāhi śīghraṁ jñāsyāma tattvatu vicintya tathā prayogam ||
lal21:29: nirmāṇu māru avacī śṛṇu mahya vatsa pāpaṁ mi dṛṣṭu supinaṁ paramaṁ sughoram |
lal21:30: bhāṣeya sarvamiha parṣadi adya śeṣaṁ saṁmūrchitā kṣititale prapateyu yūyam ||
lal21:32: raṇakāli prāpti yadi nāma jayo na doṣaḥ tatraiva yastu nihato bhavate sa doṣaḥ |
lal21:33: svapnāntare tu yadi īdṛśa te nimittā śreyo upekṣa ma raṇe paribhāvu gacchet ||
lal21:35: vyavasāyabuddhi puruṣasya raṇe prasiddhi avalambya dhairya sukṛtaṁ yadi no jayaṁ syāt |
lal21:36: kā tasya śakti mama dṛṣṭi sapāriṣadyaṁ notthātu mahya caraṇe śirasā prapattum ||
lal21:38: vistīrṇamasti hi balaṁ ca sudurbalaṁ ca astyeka śūru balavāṁśca raṇaṁjahaśca |
lal21:39: khadyotakairyadi bhavettrisahasra pūrṇā eko ravirgrasati niṣprabhatāṁ karoti ||
lal21:41: yasya mānaśca mohaśca mīmāṁsā ca na vidyate |
lal21:43: iti hi bhikṣavo māraḥ pāpīyān sārthavāhasya vacanamakṛtvā mahatīṁ caturaṅginīṁ senāmudyojayati sma mahābalaraṇaśauṇḍāṁ bhīṣaṇāṁ romaharṣaṇīmadṛṣṭāśrutapūrvāṁ samuditayā samantādaśītiryojanānyāyāmena vistāreṇa sphuṭamabhūt | yathā caikasya mārasyaivaṁ koṭīśatānāṁ trisāhasraparyāpannānāṁ mārāṇāṁ pāpīyasāṁ senābhistiryagūrdhvaṁ ca parisphuṭamabhūt ||
lal21:46: yattaka loki virūpa suraudrāḥ sarvi ta nirmita tatra śaṭhebhiḥ ||
lal21:49: ekapadā dvipadā tripadāśca yāvatsahasrapadā bahu anye ||
lal21:50: nīlamukhāni ca pītaśarīrā pītamukhāni ca nīlaśarīrā |
lal21:52: vātu pravāyati varṣati varṣaṁ vidyusahasraśatāni patanti |
lal21:53: deva guḍāyati vṛkṣa luḍanti bodhivaṭasya na īryati patram ||
lal21:54: varṣati deva pravarṣati varṣaṁ ogha vahanti jalākulabhūmim |
lal21:55: īdṛśa bhīṣaṇikā bahurāśī yatra acetana vṛkṣa patanti ||
lal21:56: dṛṣṭva ca tānatibhīṣaṇarūpāṁ sarvi visaṁsthita rūpavirūpāṁ |
lal21:57: śrīguṇalakṣaṇatejadharasyā cittu na kampati meru yathaiva ||
lal21:59: īdṛśa dharmanayaṁ vimṛṣanto susthitu dhyāyati saṁsthitu dharme ||
lal21:60: yasya bhaveta ahaṁ ti mameti bhāva samucchrayi tattvaniviṣṭāḥ |
lal21:61: so bibhiyādabuddheḥ sthitu grāhe ātmani saṁbhrami gaccha nirīkṣya ||
lal21:62: śākyasutastu svabhāvamabhāvaṁ dharma pratītya samutthita buddhā |
lal21:63: gaganopamacittu suyukto na bhramate sabalaṁ śaḍha dṛṣṭvā ||
lal21:64: iti hi bhikṣavo mārasya pāpīyasaḥ putrasahasram | tatra ye māraputrā bodhisattve ’bhiprasannāḥ sārthavāhapūrvaṁgamāḥ, te mārasya dakṣiṇe pārśve sthitā abhūvan | ye mārapākṣikāḥ, te vāme pārśve sthitā abhuvan mārasya pāpīyasaḥ | tatra māraḥ pāpīyāṁstān svān putrānāmantrayate sma—kīdṛśena balena vayaṁ bodhisattvaṁ dharṣayiṣyāmaḥ? tatra dakṣiṇe pārśve sārthavāho nāma māraputraḥ | sa pitaraṁ gāthayā pratyabhāṣat—
lal21:65: suptaṁ prabodhayitumicchati pannagendraṁ suptaṁ prabodhayitumicchati yo gajendram |
lal21:66: suptaṁ prabodhayitumicchati yo mṛgendraṁ suptaṁ prabodhayitumicchati so narendram ||
lal21:67: vāme pārśve durmatirnāma māraputraḥ sa evamāha—
lal21:68: saṁprekṣaṇena hṛdayānyabhisaṁsphuṭanti lokeṣu sāra mahatāmapi pādapānām |
lal21:69: kā śaktirasti mama dṛṣṭihatasya tasya saṁjīvituṁ jagati mṛtyuhatasya vāstu ||
lal21:71: vṛkṣeṣu sāra ka ihāsti tato bravīṣi dṛṣṭvā bhinanmi manujeṣvatha kā avasthā |
lal21:72: meruṁ giriṁ yadi bhinatsi nirīkṣaṇena naivāsya tubhya nayanebhi hatonmiṣeran ||
lal21:74: yaḥ sāgaraṁ taritumicchati vai bhujābhyāṁ toyaṁ ca tasya pibituṁ manujeṣvasantu |
lal21:75: śakyaṁ bhavedidamatastu vadāmi duḥkhaṁ yastasya vaktramabhito ’pyamalaṁ nirīkṣet ||
lal21:77: mameha dehesmi śataṁ bhujānāṁ kṣipāmi caikena śataṁ śarāṇām |
lal21:78: bhinanmi kāyaṁ śramaṇasya tāta sukhī bhava tvaṁ vraja mā vilamba ||
lal21:80: śataṁ bhujānāṁ yadi ko viśeṣo bhujā kimarthaṁ na bhavanti romāḥ |
lal21:81: bhujaikamekena tathaiva śūlāḥ taiścāpi kuryānna hi tasya kiṁcit ||
lal21:83: maitrāvatastasya muneḥ śarīre viṣaṁ na śastraṁ kramate na cāgniḥ |
lal21:84: kṣiptāni śastrāṇi vrajanti puṣpatāṁ maitrī hi lokottarabhāvi tasya ||
lal21:86: divi bhuvi ca jale ca ye balāḍhyāḥ asiparaśugharāśca guhyakā narā vā |
lal21:87: kṣamabalamimu prāpya te narendraṁ prabalabalālpabalā bhavanti sarve ||
lal21:92: meruṁ dahestvaṁ yadi vāpi kṛtsnaṁ praviśya cāntargatu medinīṁ vā |
lal21:93: dagdhuṁ na śakyaḥ sa hi vajrabuddhiḥ tvatsaṁnibhairvālikagaṅgatulyaiḥ ||
lal21:96: candrasūryau patedbhūmau mahī ca vilayaṁ vrajet ||
lal21:103: taṁ gṛhya śramaṇaṁ tāta sāgarasya paraṁ kṣipe ||
lal21:104: tiṣṭhatāṁ tāta seneyaṁ mā tvaṁ śokārdito bhava |
lal21:112: bhayaṁ hi te tāta bhṛśaṁ kimarthaṁ senāya madhye kimavasthitasya |
lal21:113: senā na tasyāsti kutaḥ sahāyāḥ kasmādbhayaṁ te bhavatīha tasmāt ||
lal21:115: yūthaṁ na loke ’sti śaśīravīnāṁ na cakravartī na ca kesarīṇām |
lal21:116: na bodhisattvāniha tāta yūthaṁ ekaḥ samartho namuciṁ nihantum ||
lal21:118: na śaktiśūlā na gadā na khaṅgāḥ na hastino ’śvā na rathā na pattiḥ |
lal21:119: taṁ śauṇḍamekaṁ śramaṇaṁ niṣaṇṇaṁ hansye ’dya mā saṁbhrama tāta kiṁci ||
lal21:121: nārāyaṇasya yatha kāya achedyabhedyo kṣāntibalaiḥ kavacito dṛḍhavīryakhaṅgaḥ |
lal21:122: trivimokṣavāhanasi prajñadhanuḥ sa tāta puṇyābalena sa hi jeṣyati mārasenām ||
lal21:124: na nivartate tṛṇagataḥ pradahan davāgniḥ kṣiptaṁ śaro na ca nivartati śikṣitena |
lal21:125: vajraṁ nabhe nipatitaṁ na nivartate ca na sthānamasti mama śākyasutaṁ hyajitvā ||
lal21:127: ārdraṁ tṛṇaṁ prāpya nivartate ’gniḥ girikūṭamāsādya nivartate śaraḥ |
lal21:128: vajraṁ mahīṁ prāpya adhaḥ prayāti aprāpya śāntamamṛtaṁ na nivartate ayam ||
lal21:130: śakya tāt antarīkṣe lekhyacitra citrituṁ yāvanti keci sarva sattva ekacitta sthāpitum |
lal21:131: candrāsūrya mārutaṁ ca śakya pāśa bandhituṁ na bodhisattva śakya tāta bodhimaṇḍi cālitum ||
lal21:133: dṛṣṭīviṣeṇa mahatā pradahāmi meruṁ bhasmīkaromi salilaṁ ca mahodadhīnām |
lal21:134: bodhiṁ ca paśya śramaṇaṁ ca ahaṁ hi tāta dṛṣṭyā yathādya ubhayaṁ hi karomi bhasmam ||
lal21:136: viṣeṇa pūrṇo yadi vaiṣa sarvo bhavettrisāhasravaraḥ pradīptaḥ |
lal21:138: viṣāṇamugraṁ tribhaveha yacca rāgaśca doṣaśca tathaiva mohaḥ |
lal21:139: te tasya kāye ca tathaiva citte nabhe yathā paṅkarajo na santi ||
lal21:143: lobhayitvana neṣyi purottamaṁ kāmaratiṁ hi karomi vaśe tava ||
lal21:145: dharmaratī sada tasya ratīhā dhyānaratī amṛtārtharatiśca |
lal21:146: sattvapramokṣaṇa maitraratiśca rāgaratiṁ sa ratiṁ na karoti ||
lal21:148: javenahaṁ candraravī graseyaṁ pravāyamānaṁ gagane ca vāyum |
lal21:149: adyaiva tāta śramaṇaṁ gṛhītvā prāsasya muṣṭiṁ vikirāmi vāyum ||
lal21:151: yathā tavaiṣo javavega ugraḥ tadvadyadi syātsuramānuṣāṇām |
lal21:152: sarve samagrāpi na te samarthāḥ kartuṁ rujāmapratipudgalasya ||
lal21:155: prāgeva saikaḥ prakaroti kiṁ te vṛndena sādhyanti hi sarvakāryā ||
lal21:157: na siṁhavṛndaṁ bhuvi dṛṣṭapūrvaṁ dṛṣṭīviṣāṇāṁ api nāsti vṛndam |
lal21:158: tejasvināṁ satyaparākramāṇāṁ puruṣarṣabhāṇāṁ api nāsti vṛndam ||
lal21:160: na te śrutā tāta giro ’bhidīptā yathā nadante tanayāstaveme |
lal21:161: vīryeṇa vegena balena yuktā vrajāma śīghraṁ śramaṇaṁ nihantum ||
lal21:163: bahavaḥ śṛgālā hi vanāntareṣu nadanti nādānna satīha siṁhe |
lal21:164: te siṁhanādaṁ tu niśāmya bhīmaṁ trastā palāyanti diśo daśāsu ||
lal21:166: nadanti tāvatsvamatā ’tighṛṣṭā manuṣyasiṁhe nadite na santi ||
lal21:168: yaccintayāmi tadihāśu bhoti kathaṁ na eṣo ima vīkṣate ca |
lal21:169: mūḍho na eṣo anabhijña kiṁ vā yadutthihitvā na palāyate laghum ||
lal21:171: mūḍho na vāyaṁ aparākramo vā yuṣmaiva mūḍhāśca asaṁyatāśca |
lal21:172: na yuṣmi jānātha imasya vīryaṁ prajñābalenāsya jitāḥ stha sarve ||
lal21:173: mārātmajānāṁ yatha gaṅgavālikā etena vīryeṇa yathaiva yūyam |
lal21:174: romasya ekaṁ na samartha cālituṁ prāgeva yaścintayi ghātayiṣye ||
lal21:175: mā yūyamatra kṣiṇuyāta mānasaṁ prasannacitā bhavathā sagauravāḥ |
lal21:176: nivartayā mā prakarotha vigrahaṁ bhaviṣyate ’sau tribhavesmi rājā ||
lal21:177: peyālam | evaṁ te sarve māraputrāḥ paripurṇaṁ putrasahasraṁ śuklapākṣikāśca kṛṣṇapākṣikāśca māraṁ pāpīyāṁsaṁ pṛthakpṛthaggāthābhiradhyabhāṣanta ||
lal21:178: atha khalu bhadraseno nāma mārasya pāpīyasaḥ senāpatiḥ, sa māraṁ pāpīyasaṁ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata—
lal21:179: ye te tavānuyātrāḥ śakro lokapālāśca kinnaragaṇāśca |
lal21:182: devāśca śuddhāvāsakāste ’pi ca sarve praṇata tasmai ||
lal21:183: ye ca taveme putrāḥ prajñāmeghāvinaśca balinaśca |
lal21:185: yāpyeṣa mārasenā aśīti sphuṭa yojanāni yakṣādyaiḥ |
lal21:187: dṛṣṭvā yathā subhīmāṁ raudrāṁ vikṛtāṁ camūmimāṁ ghorām |
lal21:188: na ca vismito na calito dhruvamasya jayo bhavatyadya ||
lal21:189: sthita yatra ca seneyaṁ tatra ulūkāḥ śivāśca viruvanti |
lal21:191: vīkṣasva bodhimaṇḍe paṭukroñcā haṁsa kokīla mayūrāḥ |
lal21:193: yatra sthita seneyaṁ tatra masiḥ pāṁśavaśca varṣanti |
lal21:197: dṛṣṭā ti supini pūrve bheṣyasi pratyakṣu yadi na gacchāsi |
lal21:198: bhasmaṁ camūṁ ca kariṣyati ṛṣibhirdeśā kṛtā yathā bhasmam ||
lal21:199: rājā yato ṛṣivaro roṣitu āsīt sa brahmadattena |
lal21:203: kiṁ te na śrutapūrvaṁ kāye dīptā sulakṣaṇā yasya |
lal21:205: ima īdṛśī vibhūtiṁ pūjārthaṁ nirmitā jinasutebhiḥ |
lal21:208: jihmīkṛtāḥ sma ca tayā nisaṁśayaṁ eṣa mārabalahantā ||
lal21:209: mūrdhnaṁ yathāsya devairdraṣṭu na śakyaṁ na vai bhavāgrasthaiḥ |
lal21:215: hastī yathāmabhāṇḍaṁ pramardate kroṣṭukān yathā siṁhaḥ |
lal21:219: eko hi kartuṁ khalu kiṁ samartho mahābalā paśyasi kiṁ na bhīmā ||
lal21:221: sūryasya loke na sahāyakṛtyaṁ candrasya siṁhasya na cakravartinaḥ |
lal21:222: bodhau niṣaṇṇasya ca niścitasya na bodhisattvasya sahāyakṛtyam ||
lal21:223: atha bodhisattvo mārasya durbalīkaraṇahetorvikasitaśatapatranibhaṁ vadanaṁ saṁcārayati sma | yaṁ dṛṣṭvā māraḥ pāpīyān prapalāyāno ’bhūt | mama camū bodhisattvasya vadanaṁ pratiṣṭheti  manyamānaḥ prapalānaḥ punareva pratinivṛtya saparivāro vividhāni praharaṇāni bodhisattvasyoparyutsṛjati sma sumerumātrāṁśca parvatān | te ca bodhisattvasyopari prakṣiptāḥ puṣpavitāne vimānāni saṁtiṣṭhante sma | ye ca dṛṣṭiviṣā āśīviṣāḥ śvāsaviṣāścāgnijvālānutsṛjanti sma, taccāgnimaṇḍalaṁ bodhisattvasya prabhāmaṇḍalamiva saṁtiṣṭhate sma ||
lal21:224: atha punareva bodhisattvo dakṣiṇena pāṇinā śīrṣaṁ pramārṣṭi sma | māraśca paśyati sma | bodhisattvasya haste khaṅga iti dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ prapalāyate sma | na kiṁciditi punareva pratinivartate sma | nivṛtya ca bodhisattvasyopari nānāvidhāni praharaṇānyutsṛjati sma asidhanuśaraśaktitomaraparaśvadhabhuśuṇḍimusalakaṇayagadācakravajramudgarapādapaśilāpāśāyoguḍānatibhayānakān | te cotkṣiptamātrā nānāvidhāni puṣpadāmāni puṣpavitānāni iva saṁtiṣṭhante sma | muktasukusumāni ca mahīmavakiranto mālyadāmāni cāvalambamānāni bodhivṛkṣaṁ vibhūṣayanti sma | tāṁśca vyūhān vibhūtiṁ dṛṣṭvā bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānīrṣyāmātsaryopahatacetā bodhisattvamabravīt—uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha he rājakumāra, rājyaṁ bhuṅkṣva, tāvattava puṇyam, kutaste mokṣaprāptiḥ?
lal21:225: atha bodhisattvo dhīragambhīrodāraślakṣṇamadhurayā vācā māraṁ pāpīyasametadavocat—tvayā tāvatpāpīyannekena nirgaḍena yajñena kāmeśvaratvaṁ prāptam | mayā tvanekāni yajñakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi nirgaḍāni yaṣṭāni | karacaraṇanayanottamāṅgāni ca nikṛtya nikṛtyārthibhyo dattāni | gṛhadhanadhānyaśayanavasanaṁ caṁkramodyānāni cānekaśo yācanakebhyo nisṛṣṭāni sattvānāṁ mokṣārthinā |
lal21:226: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṁ gāthayā pratyabhāṣat—
lal21:228: taveha sākṣī na tu kaścidasti kiṁcitpralāpena parājitastvam ||
lal21:229: bodhisattva āha—iyaṁ pāpīyan mama bhūtadhātrī pramāṇamiti ||
lal21:230: atha bodhisattvo māraṁ māraparṣadaṁ ca maitrīkaruṇāpūrvaṁgamena cittena sphuritvā siṁhavadabhīto ’nuttrasto ’stambhī adīno ’līnaḥ asaṁkṣubhito ’lulito vigatabhayalomaharṣaḥ śaṅkhadhvajamīnakalaśasvastikāṅkuśacakrāṅkamadhyena jālāvitānāvanaddhena suruciratāmranakhālaṁkṛtena mṛdutaruṇasukumāreṇānantakalpāparimitakuśalamūlasaṁbhāropacitena dakṣiṇena pāṇinā sarvakāyaṁ parimārjya salīlaṁ mahīṁ parāhanati sma | tasyāṁ ca velāyāmimāṁ gāthāmabhāṣat—
lal21:231: iyaṁ mahī sarva jagatpratiṣṭhā apakṣapātā sacarācare samā |
lal21:232: iyaṁ pramāṇā mama nāsti me mṛṣā sākṣitvamasmiṁ mama saṁprayacchatu ||
lal21:233: saṁspṛṣṭamātrā ceyaṁ mahāpṛthivī bodhisattvena ṣaḍvikāramakampat prākampat saṁprākampat | araṇat prāraṇat saṁprāraṇat | tadyathāpi nāma māgadhikānāṁ kāṁsapātrī kāṣṭhenābhyāhatā raṇatyanuraṇati, evameveyaṁ mahāpṛthivī bodhisattvena pāṇitāḍitā raṇatyanuraṇati sma ||
lal21:234: atha khalu yasyāṁ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sthāvarā nāma mahāpṛthivīdevatā sā koṭiśatapṛthivīdevatāparivārā sarvāṁ mahāpṛthivīṁ saṁprakampya nātidūre bodhisattvasya pṛthivītalaṁ bhittvārdhakāyābhyunnāmya sarvālaṁkārapratimaṇḍitā yena bodhisattvastenāvanatakāyā prāñjalīkṛtā bodhisattvametadavocat—evametanmahāpuruṣa evametat yathā tvayābhihitam | vayamatra pratyakṣāḥ | api tu bhagavaṁstvameva sadevakasya lokasya paramasākṣībhūtaḥ pramāṇabhūtaśceti | evamuktvā sthāvarā mahāpṛthivīdevatā māraṁ pāpīyāṁsamanekaprakāraṁ nirbhartsya bodhisattvaṁ cābhyabhistutya vividhaṁ ca svakaṁ prabhāvaṁ saṁdarśya saparivārā tatraivāntaradhāt ||
lal21:235: taṁ śrutva mediniravaṁ sa śaṭhaḥ sasainyaḥ uttrasta bhinnahṛdayo prapalāna sarve |
lal21:236: śrutveva siṁhanaditaṁ hi vane śṛgālāḥ kākā va loṣṭupatane sahasā praṇaṣṭāḥ ||
lal21:237: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyān duḥkhito durmanā anāttamanā apatrapamāṇarūpo mānābhibhavānna gacchati sma | na nivartate sma | na palāyate sma | paścānmukhaṁ sthitvā uttari senāmāmantrayate sma—sahitāḥ samagrāstāvadbhavantastiṣṭhantu muhurtaṁ yāvadvayaṁ jñāsyāmo yadi tāvacchakyetāyamanunayenotthāpayitum | mā khalvevaṁrūpasya sattvaratnasya sahasā vināśo bhūditi ||
lal21:238: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyān svā duhitṝrāmantrayate sma—gacchadhvaṁ yūyaṁ kanyakāḥ, bodhimaṇḍamupasaṁkramya bodhisattvasya jijñāsanāṁ kuruta—kiṁ sarāgo ’tha vītarāgaḥ | kiṁ mūko ’tha prajñaḥ | kimandho ’tha deśajño ’rthaparāyaṇaḥ | dīno vā dhīro veti | idaṁ khalu vacanaṁ śrutvā tā apsaraso yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṁkrāman | upasaṁkramya bodhisattvasya purataḥ sthitvā dvātriṁśadākārāṁ strīmāyāmupadarśayanti sma | tadyathā | katamā dvātriṁśadākārā? kāścittatrārdhavadanaṁ chādayanti sma | kāścidunnatān kaṭhinān payodharān darśayanti sma | kāścidardhavihasitairdantāvaliṁ darśayanti sma | kāścidbāhūnutkṣipya vijṛmbhamāṇān kākṣān darśayanti sma | kāścidbimbaphalopamānoṣṭhān darśayanti sma | kāścidardhanimīlitairnayanairbodhisattvaṁ nirīkṣante sma, dṛṣṭvā ca śīghraṁ nimīlayanti sma | kāścidardhaprāvṛtān payodharān darśayanti sma | kāścicchithilāmbarāṁ  samekhalāṁ śroṇīṁ darśayanti sma | kāścitsamekhalāṁ tanudukūlanivāsitāṁ śroṇīṁ darśayanti sma | kāścijjhaṇajhaṇāśadbānnūpuraiḥ kurvanti sma | kāścidekāvalīṁ stanāntareṣūpadarśayanti sma | kāścidvinagnānarghorūnupadarśayanti sma | kāścicchiraḥsvaṁseṣu ca patraguptāñśukaśārikāṁścopaviṣṭānupadarśayanti sma | kāścidardhakaṭākṣairbodhisattvaṁ nirīkṣante sma | kāścitsunivastā api durnivastāḥ kurvanti sma | kāścijjaghanarasanāḥ kampayanti sma | kāścitsaṁbhrāntā iva savilāsamitastataścaṁkramyante sma | kāścinnṛtyanti sma | kāścidrāyanti sma | kāścidvilasanti sma, lajjante ca | kāścitkadalya iva vāyuvidhūtā urū kampayanti sma | kāścidgambhīrāḥ stananti sma | kāścidaṁśukaprāvṛtāḥ saghaṇṭārasanā vihasyantyaścaṁkramyante sma | kāścidvastrāṇyābharaṇāni ca pṛthivyāṁ chorayanti sma | kāścidguhyaprakāśāni sarvābharaṇānyupadarśayanti sma | kāścidgandhānuliptān bāhūnupadarśayanti sma | kāścidgandhānulepanakuṇḍalānyupadarśayanti sma | kāścidavaguṇṭhikayā vadanāni chādayanti sma, kṣaṇekṣaṇā copadarśayanti sma | kāścitpūrvahasitaramitakrīḍitā anyonyaṁ smārayanti sma | punarapi lajjitā iva tiṣṭhanti sma | kāścitkumārīrūpāṇyaprasūtirūpāṇi madhyastrīrūpāṇi copadarśayanti sma | kāścitkāmopahitena bodhisattvaṁ nimantrayante sma | kāścinmuktakusumairbodhisattvamavakiranti sma | purataśca sthitvā bodhisattvasyāśayaṁ mīmāṁsante sma | vadanaṁ ca nirīkṣante sma—kimayaṁ raktendriyaiḥ paśyatyāhosviddūrīkaroti, nayane īryate vā na veti | tāḥ paśyanti bodhisattvasya vadanaṁ śuddhaṁ vimalaṁ candramaṇḍalamiva rāhuvinirmuktaṁ sūryamiva prodayamānaṁ yūpamiva kanakamayaṁ vikasitamiva sahasrapatraṁ havyāvasiktamivānalaṁ merumivācalaṁ cakravālamivābhyudrataṁ gupteindriyaṁ nāgamiva sudāntacittam ||
lal21:239: atha tā māraduhitaro bhūyasyā mātrayā bodhisattvasya saṁlobhanārthamimā gāthā abhāṣanta—
lal21:240: suvasantake ṛtuvara āgatake ramimo priya phullitapādapake |
lal21:242: vaya jāta sujāta susaṁsthitikāḥ sukhakāraṇa devanarāṇa susaṁtutikāḥ |
lal21:243: utthi laghuṁ paribhuñja suyauvanikaṁ durlabha bodhi nivartaya mānasakam ||
lal21:244: prekṣasi tāva imā marukanya sulaṁkṛtikā tava kāraṇa sajjita bhūṣita āgatikā |
lal21:245: ko rūpamimaṁ samavekṣya na rajyati rāgarato api jarjara kāṣṭha va śoṣitajīvitako ||
lal21:253: kāñcīvaraśroṇisamaṇḍitikāṁ prekṣahi nātha imā tava dāsinikām ||
lal21:257: yadi necchasi kāmasulālasikāṁ suṣṭu suvañcitako ’si bhṛśaṁ khalu loke ||
lal21:258: nidhi dṛṣṭa yathā hi palāyati ko ci naro dhanasaukhyamajānaku mūḍhamano |
lal21:259: tvamapi tathaiva hi rāgamajānanako yaḥ svayamāgatikāṁ na hi bhuñjasi kāminikām ||
lal21:261: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo ’nimiṣanayanaḥ prahasitavadanaḥ smitamukho ’vikopitairindriyairanabhisaṁskṛtairgātrairajihmo ’rakto ’duṣṭo ’mūḍhaḥ śailendravadaprakampyo ’navalīno ’navadīrṇo ’saṁpīḍitaḥ susaṁsthitayā buddhyā svādhīnena jñānamukhenātyantasuprahīṇatvātkleśānāṁ ślakṣṇayā madhurayā vācā brahmātirekeṇa ghopeṇa karaviṅkarutena svareṇa valgunā manojñena tāṁ māraduhitṝn gāthābhiḥ pratyabhāṣat—
lal21:262: kāmā bho bahuduḥkhasaṁcayā duḥkhamūlā dhyānarddhītapasaṁ ca bhraṁsanī abudhānām |
lal21:263: na strīkāmaguṇebhi tṛptitāṁ vidumāhuḥ prajñātṛptikaro bhaviṣyahaṁ abudhānām ||
lal21:264: kāmāṁ sevayato vivardhate puna tṛṣṇā pītvā vai lavaṇodakaṁ yathā naru kaści |
lal21:265: nātmārthe ca parārthi bhotihā pratipanno ātmārthe ca parārtha utsuko bhavitāham ||
lal21:266: phenābudbudatulyasaṁnibhaṁ tava rūpaṁ māyāraṅgamivā vithāpitaṁ svamatena |
lal21:267: krīḍā vai supineva adhruvā apinityā bālānāṁ sada cittamohanā abudhānām ||
lal21:268: netrā budbudatulyasādṛśā tvacanaddhāḥ kaṭhinaṁ śoṇitapiṇḍamudrataṁ yatha gaṇḍam |
lal21:270: saṁmūḍhā yahi bālabuddhayo na tu vijñāḥ śubhato kalpayamāna āśrayaṁ vitathena |
lal21:271: saṁsāre bahukāla saṁsarī duḥkhamūle anubhoktā nirayeṣu vedanā bahuduḥkhā ||
lal21:272: śroṇi prasravate vigandhikā pratikūlā urūjaṅghakramāśca saṁsthitā yatha yantram |
lal21:273: bhūtaṁ yuṣmi ahaṁ nirīkṣamī yatha māyā hetupratyayataḥ pravartathā vitathena ||
lal21:274: dṛṣṭvā kāmaguṇāṁśca nirguṇāṁ guṇahīnāṁ āryajñānapathasya utpathāṁ vipathāṁśca |
lal21:275: viṣapatrāgnisamāṁ mahoragāṁ yatha kruddhāṁ bālā atra hi mūrchitā sukhasaṁjñāḥ ||
lal21:276: kāmādāsu bhavīti yo nara pramadānāṁ śīle utpathi dhyāyi utpathi matihīno |
lal21:277: jñāne so hi sudūri tiṣṭhate ratilolo yo ’sau dharmaratiṁ jahitvanā rami kāmaiḥ ||
lal21:278: no rāgeṇa sahī vasāmyahaṁ na ca doṣaiḥ no nairnityaaśubhaanātmabhirvasi sārdham |
lal21:279: ārātīyaratīyasaṁvaśena ca sārdhaṁ nirmuktaṁ mama cittu māruto gagane vā ||
lal21:280: pūrṇaṁ sarvajagattvamīdṛśairyadiha syāt kalpaṁ tābhi sahā samosṛto vihareyam |
lal21:281: no vā mahya khilaṁ na rajyanā na ca moho ākāśaḥsamatulyamānasā jina bhonti ||
lal21:283: te ’pi sarvi sumahadbhaye sthitāḥ nityabhāvarahitā aśāśvatāḥ ||
lal21:284: atha khalu tā māraduhitaraḥ suśikṣitāḥ strīmāyāsu bhūyasyā mātrayā rāgamadadarpaṁ saṁjanayya ceṣṭāmupadarśya gātrāṇi vibhūṣayitvā strīmāyāmupadarśya bodhisattvaṁ pralobhayanti sma ||
lal21:301: adya bhaviṣya māru jiniyā daśabalu arahān ||
lal21:305: kiṁ muniveṣakena bhavato virama rati bhajā ||

lal21:312: yāva ca yauvanaṁ na galitaṁ prathamavayadharo

lal21:323: mārapure ca kāmaratayaḥ pramadavaśagataḥ krīḍyanubhuṅkṣva asmabhi sahā vipularatikaraḥ ||
lal21:326: śakrasuyāmadevatuṣitā namucivaśagatāḥ ko ’tra rameta naryabhilaṣite vyasanaparigate ||
lal21:328: puṣpita paśyimāṁ taruvarāṁ taruṇakisalayāṁ kokilajīvajīvakarutā madhukaravirutā |
lal21:329: snigdhasunīlakuñcitamṛduṁ dharaṇitalaruhe kiṁ narasiṁha sevita vane ramasu yuvatibhiḥ ||
lal21:331: kālavaśātpuṣpita ime kisalaya taravo bhukṣapipāsitā madhukarāḥ kusumamabhigatāḥ |
lal21:332: bhāskaru śoṣayiṣyati yadā dharaṇitalaruhāṁ pūrvajinopabhuktamamṛtaṁ vyavasitamiha me ||
lal21:334: prekṣahi tāva candravadanā navanalininibhā vāca manojña ślakṣṇa daśanā himarajatanibhā |
lal21:335: īdṛśa durlabhā surapure kuta manujapure te tvaya labdha ye suravarairabhilaṣita sadā ||
lal21:344: kiṁ tava āryaputra vikṛtaṁ yadi na bhajase ||
lal21:352: gauravu tuṣṭa prema janiyā staviṣu hitakaram ||
lal21:360: sādhvasa naṁ hi tāta pratighaṁ amaranaraguroḥ ||
lal21:362: nāpi saraktu prekṣati janaṁ na pi ca sabhṛkuṭiḥ |
lal21:363: meru caleya śuṣya udadhiḥ śaśiravi prapate
lal21:364: naiva sa doṣadarśi tribhave pramadavaśa gamiyā ||
lal21:365: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyānidaṁ vacanaṁ śrutvā bhūyasyā mātrayā duḥkhito durmanā anāttamanāḥ praduṣṭamanāstāṁ svaduhitṝnāmantrayate sma—kathaṁ bho na śakyate sa bodhimaṇḍādutthāpayitum? mā khalu mūḍhaḥ ajño ’tha yuṣmākaṁ rūpākṛtiṁ na paśyati?
lal21:366: atha khalu tā māraduhitaraḥ svapitaraṁ gāthābhiḥ pratyabhāṣanta—
lal21:367: ślakṣṇā madhuraṁ ca bhāṣate na ca rakto guru guhyaṁ ca nirīkṣate na ca duṣṭaḥ |
lal21:369: īryāṁ caryāṁ ca prekṣate na ca mūḍhaḥ kāyā sarva paneti āśayo sugabhīraḥ ||
lal21:370: niḥsaṁśayena viditāḥ pṛthu istridoṣāḥ kāmairviraktamanaso na ca rāgaraktaḥ |
lal21:371: naivāstyasau divi bhuvīha naraḥ suro vā yastasya cittacaritaṁ parijānayeyā ||
lal21:372: yā istrimāya upadarśita tatra tāta pravilīyu tasya hṛdayaṁ bhaviyaḥ sarāgaḥ |
lal21:373: taṁ dṛṣṭa ekamapi kampitu nāsya cittaṁ śailendrarāja iva tiṣṭhati so ’prakampyaḥ ||
lal21:374: śatapuṇyatejabharito guṇatejapūrṇaḥ śīle tapasmi carito bahukalpakoṭyaḥ |
lal21:375: brahmā ca deva śubhateja viśuddhasattvā mūrdhnā nipatya caraṇeṣu namanti tasmai ||
lal21:376: niḥsaṁśayena vinihatya sa mārasenāṁ pūrve jinānumata prāpsyati agrabodhim |
lal21:377: tātā na rocati hi no va raṇe vivāde balavatsu vigrahu sukṛcchra ayaṁ prayogaḥ ||
lal21:378: prekṣasva tāta gagane maṇiratnacūḍā saṁbodhisattvanayutāḥ sthita gauraveṇa |
lal21:380: ye cetanā api ca ye ca acetanā ca vṛkṣāśca śaila garūḍendrasurendrayakṣāḥ |
lal21:381: abhyonatā abhimukhā guṇaparvatasya śreyo bhave pratinivartitumadya tāta ||
lal21:383: na taṁ taredyasya na pāramuttare na taṁ khanedyasya na mūlamuddharet |
lal21:384: na kopayettaṁ kṣamayetpunopi taṁ kuryānna taṁ yena bhavecca durmanāḥ ||
lal21:385: atha khalu bhikṣavastasmin samaye ’ṣṭau bodhivṛkṣadevatāḥ | tadyathā—śrīḥ vṛddhiḥ tapā śreyasī viduḥ ojobalā satyavādinī samaṅginī ca | tā etā bodhisattvaṁ saṁpūjya ṣoḍaśabhirākārairbodhisattvaṁ śriyā vardhayanti sma, abhiṣṭuvanti sma—
lal21:386: upaśobhase tvaṁ viśuddhasattva candra iva śuklapakṣe |
lal21:387: abhivirocase tvaṁ viśuddhabuddha sūrya iva prodayamānaḥ ||
lal21:390: vibhrājase tvaṁ agrasattva parvatarāja iva sāgaramadhye |
lal21:395: akaluṣabuddhirasi agrasattva anavatapta iva saraḥ sadā prasannaḥ ||
lal21:396: aniketabuddhistvaṁ agrasattva māruta iva sarvaloke sadāprasaktaḥ |
lal21:397: durāsadasttvaṁ agrasattva tejorāja iva sarvamanyunā prahīnaḥ ||
lal21:398: balavānasi tvaṁ agrasattva nārāyaṇa iva durdharṣaḥ |
lal21:403: evaṁ khalu bhikṣavo bodhivṛkṣadevatāḥ ṣoḍaśākāraṁ bodhisattvaṁ śriyā vardhayanti sma ||
lal21:404: tatra bhikṣavaḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāḥ ṣoḍaśabhirākārairmāraṁ pāpīyāṁsaṁ durbalaṁ kurvanti sma | katamaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ? tadyathā—
lal21:407: ekākyasi tvaṁ pāpīyaṁ nirjita iva śūrapratijñaḥ |
lal21:408: advitīyastvaṁ pāpīyaṁ aṭavyāṁ tyakta iva rogārtaḥ ||
lal21:415: palāyiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ koṣṭuka iva siṁhanādena |
lal21:416: vidhuneṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ vairambhavāyuvikṣipta iva pakṣī ||
lal21:421: evaṁ khalu bhikṣavaḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāḥ ṣoḍaśabhirākārairmāraṁ pāpīyāṁsaṁ durbalamakārṣuḥ ||
lal21:422: tatra bhikṣavo bodhiparicārikā devaputrāḥ ṣoḍaśabhirākārairmāraṁ pāpīyāṁsaṁ vichacdayanti sma | katamaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ? tadyathā—
lal21:423: adya tvaṁ pāpīyaṁ nirjeṣyase bodhisattvena parasainya iva śūreṇa |
lal21:424: nigṛhīṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ bodhisattvena durbalamalla iva mahāmallena ||
lal21:425: abhibhaviṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ bodhisattvena khadyotakamiva sūryamaṇḍalena |
lal21:426: vidhvaṁsayiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ bodhisattvena muñjamuṣṭimiva mahāmārutena ||
lal21:427: vitrāsiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ bodhisattvena kesariṇeva śṛgālaḥ |
lal21:428: prapātiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ bodhisattvena mahāsāla iva mūlachinnam ||
lal21:430: viśoṣiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ bodhisattvena goṣpadavārīva mahātapena ||
lal21:431: palāyiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ bodhisattvena vadhyavimukta iva dhūrtapuruṣaḥ |
lal21:432: udbhrāmiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ bodhisattvena agnidāheneva madhukaravṛndam ||
lal21:433: roṣiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ bodhisattvena rāṣṭrabhraṣṭa iva dharmarājaḥ |
lal21:434: dhyāyiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ bodhisattvena jīrṇakroñca iva lūnapakṣaḥ ||
lal21:435: vibhartsyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ bodhisattvena kṣīṇapathyādana ivāṭavīkāntāre |
lal21:436: vilapiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ bodhisattvena bhinnayānapātra iva mahārṇave ||
lal21:437: āmlāyiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ bodhisattvena kalpadāha iva tṛṇavanaspatayaḥ |
lal21:438: vikiriṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṁ bodhisattvena mahāvajreṇeva girikūṭam ||
lal21:439: evaṁ khalu bhikṣavo bodhiparicārikā devaputrāḥ ṣoḍaśākārairmāraṁ vicchandayanti sma | na ca māraḥ pāpīyān vinivartate sma ||
lal21:441: bhūtāṁ codana śrutva devatagaṇā na nivartate so ’ntako
lal21:442: ucchethā hanathā vilumpatha imāṁ mā dāsyathā jīvitam |
lal21:443: eṣottīrṇa svayaṁ mamāpi viṣayāṁ tāriṣyate cāparāṁ
lal21:444: nānyaṁ mokṣa vademi kiṁci śramaṇe utthāpayetprakramet ||
lal21:446: meruḥ parvatarāja sthānatu cale sarvaṁ jaganno bhavet
lal21:451: kāmeśvaro ’smi vasitā iha sarvaloke devā sadānavagaṇā manujāśca tiryā |
lal21:452: vyāptā mayā mama vaśena ca yānti sarve uttiṣṭha mahya viṣayastha vacaṁ kuruṣva ||
lal21:454: kāmeśvaro ’si yadi vyaktamanīśvaro ’si dharmeśvaro ’hamapi paśyasi tattvato mām |
lal21:455: kāmeśvaro ’si yadi durgati na prayāsi prāpsyāmi bodhimavaśasya tu paśyataste ||
lal21:457: ekātmakaḥ śramaṇa kiṁ prakaroṣi raṇye yaṁ prārthayasyasulabhaḥ khalu saṁprayogaḥ |
lal21:458: bhṛgvaṅgiraprabhṛtibhistapaso prayatnā prāptaṁ na tatpadavaraṁ manujaḥ kutastvam ||
lal21:461: nityaṁ na nityamiti cātmani saṁśrayadbhiḥ mokṣaṁ ca deśagamanasthitamāśrayadbhiḥ ||
lal21:462: te tatvato ’rtharahitāḥ puruṣaṁ vadanti vyāpiṁ pradeśagata śāśvatamāhureke |
lal21:463: mūrtaṁ na mūrtamaguṇaṁ guṇināṁ tathaiva kartā na karta iti cāpyapare bruvanti ||
lal21:464: prāpyādya bodhi virajāmiha cāsanasthaḥ tvāṁ jitva māra vihataṁ sabalaṁ sasainyam |
lal21:465: varteṣyi asya jagataḥ prabhavodbhavaṁ ca nirvāṇa duḥkhaśamanaṁ tatha śītibhāvam ||
lal21:466: māraḥ kruddho duṣṭo ruṣṭaḥ paruṣagira puna tu bhaṇate gṛhāṇa sugautamaṁ
lal21:467: eṣo hyeko ’raṇye nyasto grahiya mama puratu vrajathā laghuṁ vaśu kurvathā |
lal21:468: śīghraṁ gatvā mahyaṁ gehe haḍinigaḍayugalavikṛtaṁ karotha duvārikaṁ
lal21:469: svā maṁ drakṣye duḥkhenārtaṁ bahuvividhajavitaravitaṁ marūṇa va ceṭakam ||
lal21:471: śakyākāśe lekhyaṁ citraṁ bahuvividhavikṛta padaśaḥ prakartu pṛthakpṛthak
lal21:472: śakyo vāyuḥ pāśairbaddhuṁ diśavidiśagamanajavito nareṇa suyatnataḥ |
lal21:473: śakyā kartuṁ candrādityau tamatimiravitimirakarau nabho ’dya mahītalaṁ
lal21:476: ha putra vatsa dayitā kimasi pranaṣṭo dṛṣṭvā imāṁ namucisenamatīva bhīmām ||
lal21:478: adya prayāsyasi vināśu mahāraṇesmiṁ mārasya eṣyasi vaśaṁ asurasya venduḥ ||
lal21:479: brahmasvareṇa karaviṅkarutasvareṇā tān yakṣarākṣasagaṇāṁ sugato babhāṣe |
lal21:480: ākāśu trāsayitumicchati yo hyavidvān so ’smadvidhaṁ drumavarād grahaṇāya icchet ||
lal21:481: bhittvā ca yo raju gaṇeya mahāsahasra lomnā ca sāgarajalaṁ ca samuddharedyaḥ |
lal21:482: vajrāmayāṁ girivarāṁ vikiretkṣaṇācca so cāpi māṁ tarugataṁ na viheṭhayeta ||
lal21:483: yugamantarasmi sthita māru praduṣṭacitto niṣkoṣa pāṇinamasiṁ pragṛhītva tīkṣṇam |
lal21:484: uttiṣṭha śīghra śramaṇāsmamatena gaccha mā veṇuyaṣṭi haritāṁ va chinadmi te ’dya ||
lal21:486: sarveyaṁ trisahasra medini yadi māraiḥ prapūrṇā bhavet
lal21:487: sarveṣāṁ yatha meru parvatavaraḥ pāṇīṣu khaṅgo bhavet |
lal21:488: te mahyaṁ na samartha loma calituṁ prāgeva māṁ ghātituṁ
lal21:489: mā dūṣī nativela saṁpranadahe smāremi te ’nadṛḍham ||
lal21:490: vidhyanti śailaśikharāṁ jvalitāgnivarṇāṁ vṛkṣāṁ samūlaka kṣipī tatha tāmraloham |
lal21:491: uṣṭrāśca gogajamukhāstatha bhairavākṣā āśīviṣā bhujaga dṛṣṭiviṣāśca ghorāḥ ||
lal21:492: megheva utthita caturdiśa garjamānā vajrāśanī tatha ayoguḍa varṣamāṇāḥ |
lal21:493: asiśaktitīṣṇaparaśuṁ saviṣāṁśca bāṇāṁ bhindanti medinitalaṁ pramathanti vṛkṣāṁ ||
lal21:494: bāhūśataiḥ śaraśatāni kṣipanti keci āśīviṣāṁ hutavahāṁśca mukhā sṛjanti |
lal21:495: makarādikāṁśca jalajānudadhergṛhītvā vidhyanti keci bhujagāṁ garuḍāśca bhūtvā ||
lal21:497: āsādya medinitalaṁ kṣubhayanti corvīṁ heṣṭhā paskandha salilasya viloḍayanti ||
lal21:498: kecitpatanti puratastatha pṛṣṭhato ’sya vāme ca dakṣiṇa patanti aho ti vatsa |
lal21:499: viparītahastacaraṇā jvalitottamāṅgā netrebhi niścarati vidyudiva pradīptā ||
lal21:500: dṛṣṭvā vikāravikṛtā namucestu senā māyākṛtaṁ ca yatha prekṣati śuddhasattvaḥ |
lal21:501: naivātra māru na balaṁ na jaganna cātmā udacandrarūpasadṛśo bhramati trilokaḥ ||
lal21:502: cakṣurna istri puruṣo napi cātmanīyaṁ srotaṁ ca ghrāṇa tathā jihva tathaiva kāyaḥ |
lal21:503: adhyātmaśūnya bahiśūnya pratītya jātā dharmā ime karakavedakavītivṛttāḥ ||
lal21:504: so satyavākyamakarotsada satyavādī yeneha satyavacanenima śūnya dharmāḥ |
lal21:505: ye keci saumya vinaye anukūlapakṣāḥ te śastra pāṇiṣu nirīkṣiṣu puṣpadāmāṁ ||
lal21:506: so dakṣiṇe karatale racitāgrajāle tāmrairnakhaiḥ suruciraiḥ sahasrāracakre |
lal21:507: jāmbūnadārcisadṛśaiḥ śubhapuṇyajuṣṭe mūrdhnātu yāva spṛśate caraṇāṁ salīlam ||
lal21:508: bāhuṁ prasārya yatha vidyudivā nabhasthā ābhāṣate vasumatīniya mahya sākṣī |
lal21:509: citrā mi yajña nayutānapi yaṣṭa pūrve na mi jātu yācanaka bandhakṛtā nu dāsye ||
lal21:510: āpo mi sākṣi tatha teja tathaiva vāyu brahmā prajāpati sajotiṣa candrasūryāḥ |
lal21:511: buddhā mi sākṣi daśasu sthita ye diśāsu yatha mahya śīlavrataudgata bodhiaṅgāḥ ||
lal21:512: dānaṁ mi sākṣi tatha śīlu tathaiva kṣāntiḥ vīryāpi sākṣi tatha dhyāna tathaiva prajñā |
lal21:513: catura pramāṇa mama sākṣi tathā abhijñā anupūrvabodhicari sarva mameha sākṣī ||
lal21:514: yāvanti sattva nikhilā daśasu diśāsu yatteṣu puṇya bala śīlu tathaiva jñānam |
lal21:515: yajñā nirargaḍa ya yaṣṭa śaṭhaḥ kalībhiḥ te mahya roma śatimāṁ kala nopayanti ||
lal21:516: so pāṇinā dharaṇi āhanate salīlaṁ raṇate iyaṁ vasumatī yatha kaṁsapātrī |
lal21:517: māro niśamya ravu mediniye nirastaḥ śṛṇute vacaṁ hanata gṛhṇatu kṛṣṇabandhum ||
lal21:518: prasvinnagātru hatateju vivarṇavaktro māro jarābhihatu ātmanu saṁprapaśyī |
lal21:519: uratāḍa krandatu bhayārtu anāthabhūto bhrāntaṁ mano namucito gatu citta moham ||
lal21:520: hastyaśvayānaratha bhūmitale nirastāḥ dhāvanti rākṣasa kubhāṇḍa piśāca bhītāḥ |
lal21:521: saṁmūḍha mārga na labhanti alenatrāṇāḥ pakṣī davāgnipataneva nirīkṣya krāntāḥ ||
lal21:522: mātā svasā pitara putra tathaiva bhrātā pṛcchanti tatra kahi dṛṣṭa kahiṁ gatā vā |
lal21:523: anyonya vigraha karonti tathaiva heṭhāḥ prāptā vayaṁ vyasana jīvita nāvakāśaḥ ||
lal21:524: sā mārasena vipulā mahatī akṣobhyā vibhraṣṭa sarva viralīkṛta naiva saṁdhiḥ |
lal21:525: divasāni sapta abhijāni paraspareṇa ābhāsi dṛṣṭa yadi jīvasi taṁ khu prītāḥ ||
lal21:526: sā vṛkṣadevata tadā karuṇāṁ hi kṛtvā vārīghāṭaṁ grahiya siñcati kṛṣṇabandhum |
lal21:527: uttiṣṭha śīghra vraja he ma puno vilamba evaṁ hi teṣa bhavate guruuddharāṇām ||
lal21:529: duḥkhaṁ bhayaṁ vyasana śoka vināśanaṁ ca dhikkāraśabdamavamānagataṁ ca dainyam |
lal21:530: prāpto ’smi adya aparādhya suśuddhasatve aśrutva vākya madhuraṁ hitamātmajānām ||
lal21:532: bhayaṁ ca duḥkhaṁ vyasanaṁ ca dainyaṁ dhikkāraśabdaṁ vadhabandhanaṁ ca |
lal21:533: doṣānanekāṁ labhate hyavidvān nirāparādheṣvapi rādhyate yaḥ ||
lal21:534: devāsurā garuḍa rākṣasa kinnarendrā brahmātha śakra paranirmita sākaniṣṭhāḥ |
lal21:535: bhāṣanti tasya vijayaṁ jaya lokavīra yatredṛśī namucisena tvayā nirastā ||
lal21:536: hārārdhacandra dhvaja chatrapatāka dentī puṣpāgarū tagaracandanacūrṇavarṣāṁ |
lal21:537: tūryā parāhaniya vākyamudīrayante acchā drume tuva ca śūra jitārisiṁhā ||
lal21:538: atraiva cāsanavare labhase ’dya bodhiṁ āveṇikāṁ daśabalāṁ pratisaṁvidaṁ ca |
lal21:539: sarvaṁ ca buddhaviṣayaṁ labhase ’dya śūra maitrā vijitya vipulāṁ śaṭhamārapakṣāṁ ||
lal21:540: iha māradharṣaṇakṛte ca raṇe pravṛtte saṁbodhisattvabalavikrama yebhi dṛṣṭam |
lal21:541: ṣaṭtriṁśakoṭinayutā cature ca viṁśā yebhirmanaḥ praṇihitaṁ varabuddhabodhau ||
